title: Five-Star Luxury In Italy's Most Loved Beach Destination
description:
Holiday like European royalty and embrace the ‘Dolce Vita’ of Italy's much loved Adriatic Riviera with a stay at the iconic, five-star Grand Hotel Rimini - a magnificent hotel with over 100 years of history set right along Rimini's popular seafront.

As one of the country's most popular coastal destinations, Rimini will give you a true insight into the Italian lifestyle, with its lively seafront stretching as far as the eye can see, a vibrant atmosphere and mouthwatering food. Your luxe escape includes daily breakfast, a relaxing massage each, access to the Dolce Vita Spa's facilities, a complimentary fruit basket in your room, complimentary parking and 10% discount on food and drinks at La Dolce Vita restaurant.
offer_address: Parco Federico Fellini 47921, 47921 Rimini RN, Italy

title: Holiday like European Royalty in Italy’s Most Loved Holiday Destination
description: Discover the allure of Rimini: one of Italy's most popular coastal destinations, Rimini will give you a true insight into Italian lifestyle, with its lively ‘lungomare’ or seafront stretching as far as the eye can see, a vibrant atmosphere and mouthwatering food.
